title: Trolling in ranked should = season ban or permanant account deletion.
body: I think, if a summoner is caught trolling 3 games or more in ranked, they should be banned from playing rank games in that season, or potentially have their account deleted forever, depending on number of offences. For example, players caught trolling multiple seasons, should have their accounts deleted forever. The consequences of the reporting system needs to be stronger. I dont mind losing when everyone is trying their best, but, when a player is intentionally feeding, or intentionally playing badly the entire match, I think this player does not deserve to play in ranked, and potentially does not deserve to play league of legend period. A team orientated game. What does everyone think?
